#include<cstdio>
 
using namespace std;

int b[25];
 
int powercal(int n)      
{
    int i,j=1,sum=0;
    float temp=1;
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
      sum=sum+temp;
      temp=(temp*(n-i))/i;
    }
    return sum;
}

void sol()
{
    long unsigned int sum=0,total=0;
    int i;
    for(i=1;i<=23;i++)
    {
      sum=powercal(i)*((i*(i+1))/2);
      total=total+sum;
      b[i-1]=total%8388608;
    }
}
 
int main()
{
	int n;
	long unsigned int m;
    sol();
    scanf("%d",&n);
    while(n--)
    {
	  scanf("%lu",&m);  
	  if(m>23)
      m=23;
      printf("%d\n",b[m-1]);
    }
	return 0;
}
